thread.title: Neuroprosthesis enables paralysed man to feed himself
thread.title_full: Neuroprosthesis enables paralysed man to feed himself

title: Neuroprosthesis enables paralysed man to feed himself
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Neuroprosthesis enables paralysed man to feed himself 29 March 2017 Last updated at 00:32 BST 
Bill Kochevar was paralysed from the shoulders down in a bicycle accident. 
He can now eat and drink again thanks to new technology which reconnects his brain with his muscles. Related Topics
